data.content:
Tính từ
(+ at, by)
bị xúc phạm
he felt deeply affronted at her rudeness
nó cảm thấy bị xúc phạm sâu xa bởi lối thô lỗ của cô ta

noun
plural -fronts
[count] formal :an action or statement that insults or offends someone
He regarded her rude behavior as a personal affront. - often + to
Her remarks were an affront to all of us.
The test was an affront to our intelligence. [=the test was too simple]
verb
-fronts; -fronted; -fronting
[+ obj] formal :to do or say something that shows a lack of respect for (someone or someone's feelings) - usually used as (be) affronted
He was affronted [=insulted, offended] by her rude behavior.
